input.activity_signal: Company website found via search at opentct.net offering VoIP solutions, SMS messaging, and VoIP termination services. Additional 2023 FCC state notification filing found in South Dakota PUC records (filed 01/10/23). Active blog presence at opentact.blogspot.com describing AI-powered communication platform. Mobile app "Roamilo eSIM" published by Opentact on Google Play store.
input.product_summary: Opentact provides a comprehensive communication platform offering VoIP services, SMS messaging, phone number services, media servers, PBX solutions, call tracking, and AI-powered call centers, positioning itself as an all-in-one communication solution.
